TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlDataProvider extends System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider implements class System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext
Public Class XmlDataProvider Inherits DataSourceProvider Implements IUriContext

summary.span: 允许以声明方式访问数据绑定的 XML 数据。

span.span: Enables declarative access to XML data for data binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 在部分信任沙盒，失败时它没有权限来访问给定的数据。In a partial-trust sandbox, fails when it does not have permissions to access the given data. 有关部分信任安全性的详细信息，请参阅[WPF 部分信任安全](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md)。For more information about partial trust security, see [WPF Partial Trust Security](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md). 公开了以下方式来访问[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)]数据。 exposes the following ways to access [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] data. - 您可将内联[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]数据使用类。You can embed inline [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data using the class. - 你可以设置属性的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]数据文件。You can set the property to the of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data file. - 你可以设置属性。You can set the property to an . 执行完全刷新的所有绑定时事件发生。 performs a full refresh of all bindings when a event occurs. 有特定的节点不进行优化。There are no optimizations for specific nodes. 属性设置为`true`默认情况下，这意味着，检索数据并生成的集合[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]异步默认节点。The property is set to `true` by default, which means that the retrieves data and produces the collection of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] nodes asynchronously by default.

The base URI.

summary.span: 准备加载内联 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] 或外部 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] 文件，以生成 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] 节点的集合。

span.span: Prepares the loading of either the inline [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] or the external [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] file to produce a collection of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] nodes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 执行是立即或在后台线程，基于值属性。The execution is either immediate or on a background thread, based on the value of the property. 调用此方法和基类方法。This method is called by the and methods of the base class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::XmlDocument ^ Document { System::Xml::XmlDocument ^ get(); void set(System::Xml::XmlDocument ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要用作绑定源的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the to use as the binding source.
The to use as the binding source.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公开了以下方式来访问[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)]数据。 exposes the following ways to access [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] data. - 您可将内联[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]数据使用类。You can embed inline [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data using the class. - 你可以设置属性的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]数据文件。You can set the property to the of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data file. - 你可以将此属性设置为。You can set this property to an . 当对执行完全刷新的所有绑定事件发生。 performs a full refresh of all bindings on when a event occurs. 有特定的节点不进行优化。There are no optimizations for specific nodes. 如果属性是设置，那么任何内联[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]数据将被丢弃。If the property is set, then any inline [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data is discarded. 如果设置属性，则清除属性和任何内联[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]数据将被丢弃。If the property is set, then the property is cleared and any inline [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data is discarded. 设置以下属性隐式将导致此若要刷新的对象： ， ， ，和。Setting the following properties will implicitly cause this object to refresh: , , , and . 更改多个刷新导致属性，使用时建议。When changing multiple refresh-causing properties, the use of is recommended.

returns.span: 如果属性值已更改，不再是默认值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the property value has changed from its default; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这`ShouldSerialize`提供方法，因为属性不具有简单的默认值。This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the property does not have a simple default value. 此方法指示属性是否已从其默认值。This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value. 如果你也正在开发的设计器通常调用此方法或开发你自己的控件包含。You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the or developing your own control incorporating the .

summary.span: 获取或设置要用作绑定源的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] 数据文件的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] data file to use as the binding source.

value.span: 的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]要用作绑定源的数据文件。

span.span: The of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data file to use as the binding source.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公开了以下方式来访问[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)]数据。 exposes the following ways to access [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] data. - 您可将内联[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]数据使用类。You can embed inline [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data using the class. - 你可以将此属性设置为的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]数据文件。You can set this property to the of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data file. - 你可以设置属性。You can set the property to an . 如果属性是设置，那么任何内联[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]数据将被丢弃。If the property is set, then any inline [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data is discarded. 如果设置属性，则清除属性和任何内联[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]数据将被丢弃。If the property is set, then the property is cleared and any inline [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data is discarded. 设置以下属性隐式将导致此若要刷新的对象： ， ， ，和。Setting the following properties will implicitly cause this object to refresh: , , , and . 更改多个刷新导致属性，使用时建议。When changing multiple refresh-causing properties, the use of is recommended. ## Examples 在某些应用程序，嵌入[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]内联至[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]页可能很不方便，因为必须在编译时知道数据的确切内容。In some applications, embedding the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] inline within the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] page can be inconvenient because the exact content of the data must be known at compile time. 因此，你可以获取数据从一个外部[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]文件，如以下示例所示。Therefore, you can obtain the data from an external [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] file, as in the following example. [!code-xaml[XMLDataSource2#XmlFileExample](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XmlDataSource2/CS/Window1.xaml#xmlfileexample)] 如果[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]数据驻留在远程[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]文件，你定义的访问权限的数据通过分配适当[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_url](~/includes/tla2sharptla-url-md.md)]到属性，如下所示：If the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data resides in a remote [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] file, you define access to the data by assigning an appropriate [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_url](~/includes/tla2sharptla-url-md.md)] to the attribute as follows: ``` ```

span.span: Gets the inline [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] content.
The inline [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 分析器使用此属性来编译嵌入的文本内容[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]数据岛。This property is used by the parser to compile the literal content of the embedded [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data island. ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` --or-- ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *elementDataRoot**elementDataRoot* 必须的。Required. 包含的数据岛的单个根元素。The single root element of the enclosed data island. 如果没有单一根，`x:XData`作为数据源无效。Without a single root, the `x:XData` is invalid as a data source. *elementData**elementData* 可选。Optional. 表示你的数据的 XML。XML that represents your data. 可以包含任意数目的元素作为元素数据、 嵌套的元素可包含在其他元素，依此类推，受约束的 XML 的一般规则。Any number of elements can be contained as element data, nested elements can be contained in other elements, and so on, subject to the general rules of XML.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ XPath { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于生成数据集合的 查询。

span.span: Gets or sets the query used to generate the data collection.

value.span: 用于生成数据集合的 查询。

span.span: The query used to generate the data collection.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将处理`XPath`表达式从属性。The method handles the `XPath` expressions from the property. `XPath` 不支持函数。`XPath` functions are not supported. 有关`XPath`表达式的信息，请参阅文档和示例部分中提供一些示例。For `XPath` expression information, see the documentation and some examples provided in the Example section. 设置以下属性隐式将导致此若要刷新的对象： ， ， ，和。Setting the following properties will implicitly cause this object to refresh: , , , and . 更改多个刷新导致属性，使用时建议。When changing multiple refresh-causing properties, the use of is recommended.
